alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 12 at 1:44PM MDT until March 14 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts up to 60 mph, are possible. Localized gusts up to 70 mph are possible in wind prone areas along the eastern slopes of the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains, Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera, Cascade County below 5000ft, and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...From late Monday night through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reduced visibility due to blowing snow and partial lane blockages are possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
